title: Salad is Life
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a huge range of salads made in store in front of you. You can also create your own salad and your fresh fruit/vegetable juice. The bar, with a few seats inside, provides online ordering and also can provide lunch delivery to your city centre home/office Mon-Fri 12-2pm.
